sentences.en: 'Did they alight on the road in the course of the night?'
sentences.cn: “ 他们是在夜里中途下车的 么 ? ”

sentences.en: A cigarette set the dry grass alight .
sentences.cn: 一支香烟把干草点燃了。

sentences.en: A thrush alighted on a branch of the pine tree.
sentences.cn: 一只画眉落在这棵松树的一根树枝上。

sentences.en: He wore a face alight with happiness.
He would then suddenly alight on the tune he really wanted to play.
sentences.cn: 他常会在那时突然想起他真正想弹的曲子。

sentences.en: her eyes alighted on the item in question.
sentences.cn: 她注意到被提及的那项。

sentences.en: Her eyes were alight with a girlish enjoyment of life.
sentences.cn: 她的眼睛闪闪发亮，闪烁着少女般的幸福和满足。

sentences.en: Her face was alight with happiness.
sentences.cn: 她脸上闪耀着喜悦的光辉.

sentences.en: Passengers for Lanzhou alight at Nanjing.
sentences.cn: 去兰州的乘客在南京下车.

sentences.en: Prepare to alight, for we are almost there.
sentences.cn: 我们马上要到了, 准备下车吧.

sentences.en: She paused and turned, her face alight with happiness.
sentences.cn: 她停住转过身，脸上洋溢着幸福。

sentences.en: The car was doused in petrol and set alight.
sentences.cn: 这辆汽车被浇上汽油点燃了。

sentences.en: The car was set alight and pushed over a hill.
sentences.cn: 那辆汽车被点燃后就被推下山去。

sentences.en: The gas fire was still alight.
sentences.cn: 燃气引起的大火还在熊熊燃烧。

sentences.en: The room was alight with lamps.
There are many people who " the moment they alight from the official carriage " make a hullabaloo.
sentences.cn: 有许多人 “ 下车伊始 ”,就哇喇哇喇地发议论.

phrases.phrase: set the world (或 the place) alight

trans.tran_cn: 点着的，点亮的，烧着的，烧起的

trans.tran_en: if a bird or insect alights on something, it stops flying and stands on it

trans.tran_cn: 下来，飞落，偶然发现，碰到，降落
